medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced abdominal pain for the last ____ days, with acute worsening localized to the right lower quadrant (RLQ) occurring 2 days ago. There were no associated symptoms of nausea, vomiting, fever, chills, or dysuria/hematuria.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Psoriatic arthritis, high blood pressure; previous surgeries include hysterectomy, back surgery, and debridement of left lower extremity wound.
